info.title: Projects API
info.description: The Holded’s Projects API is organized around REST, using HTTP responses code to keep you informed about what’s going on. Our endpoints will returns you metada in JSON format directly from Holded.

items.title: Project Basic Output
items.description: The properties that are included when fetching a list of Projects.

allOf.title: Project Common
allOf.description: The properties that are shared amongst all versions of the Project model.

put.description:
Update a specific project.

Only the params included in the operation will update the project.

value.name: Business plan
value.desc: business plan for the new project
